name: facebook-ads-mcp-server
description: A comprehensive Python MCP server for Facebook Ads API with full CRUD operations
long_description: This extension provides comprehensive Facebook Ads management capabilities through a Python MCP server with full CRUD operations. It enables programmatic access to create, read, update, and delete campaigns, ad sets, ads, and creatives. Features include Campaign Budget Optimization (CBO), Ad Set Budget Optimization (ABO), Dynamic Product Ads (DPA) with Advantage+ features, advanced targeting, S3 media integration, performance insights, and smart query tools. All 32 tools are prefixed with 'facebook_' to prevent namespace collisions when used alongside other MCP servers.

tools.name: facebook_create_cbo_campaign
tools.description: Create a Campaign Budget Optimization (CBO) campaign with budget managed at campaign level

tools.name: facebook_create_abo_campaign
tools.description: Create an Ad Set Budget Optimization (ABO) campaign with budget managed at ad set level

tools.name: facebook_update_campaign_budget
tools.description: Update the daily or lifetime budget of an existing campaign

tools.name: facebook_deactivate_or_activate_campaign
tools.description: Change campaign status (ACTIVE, PAUSED, ARCHIVED, or DELETED)

tools.name: facebook_get_campaign_by_id
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific campaign by its ID

tools.name: facebook_get_campaigns_by_adaccount

tools.name: facebook_create_adset

tools.name: facebook_update_adset

tools.name: facebook_get_adset_by_id

tools.name: facebook_get_adsets_by_ids

tools.name: facebook_get_adsets_by_adaccount
tools.description: List all ad sets in an ad account with filtering and pagination

tools.name: facebook_get_adsets_by_campaign
tools.description: List all ad sets within a specific campaign

tools.name: facebook_create_catalog_creative
tools.description: Create a catalog-based creative for Dynamic Product Ads (DPA) with Advantage+ features

tools.name: facebook_create_ad_with_catalog_creative

tools.name: facebook_fetch_product_sets

tools.name: facebook_edit_ad

tools.name: facebook_bulk_update_status

tools.name: facebook_get_ad_by_id
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific ad by its ID

tools.name: facebook_get_ads_by_adaccount
tools.description: List all ads in an ad account with filtering and pagination

tools.name: facebook_get_ads_by_campaign
tools.description: List all ads within a specific campaign

tools.name: facebook_get_ads_by_adset

tools.name: facebook_get_adaccount_insights

tools.name: facebook_get_campaign_insights
tools.description: Retrieve performance insights and analytics for a campaign

tools.name: facebook_get_adset_insights
tools.description: Retrieve performance insights and analytics for an ad set

tools.name: facebook_get_ad_insights
